DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate whether acupuncture help decrease number severity headaches people Traumatic Brain Injury . The aim study compare two different type acupuncture—either Traditional Chinese Acupuncture ear acupuncture—to group receive acupuncture . Acupuncture demonstrate reduce pain , improve health-related quality life , prevent migraine headache , improve tension chronic daily headache .
DOC.brief_title: Exploratory Study Evaluate 2 Acupuncture Methods Treatment Headaches Associated With TBI
DOC.detailed_description: This 12 week study . If eligible , participant randomly assign 1of 3 group : ear acupuncture , Traditional Chinese Acupuncture , usual care group . Subjects receiving acupuncture : - meet one acupuncturists conduct first assessment - come Walter Reed Army Medical Center ( WRAMC ) 10 time 6-week period receive acupuncture treatment license acupuncturist Subjects usual care group : - receive acupuncture treatment - continue usual treatment plan - give option receive 10 acupuncture treatment 6- 12-week period All subject also : - complete questionnaire 3 different time : baseline ( begin study ) , 6 week , 12 week . These questionnaire assess headache , overall health quality life - complete daily headache diary - continue treat headache - continue take prescription over-the-counter medication condition treat
DOC.criteria: 1 . 1869 year age 2 . Service Members previous deployment war zone 3 . Nonacute mild moderate traumatic brain injury define : Injury event ( i.e. , blast , fall , MVC , head impact ) occur least 7 day prior Loss consciousness ( present ) less 24 hour alteration consciousness posttraumatic amnesia le one week 4 . Presence headache etiology require selfmedication medical management least 4 headache day past 4 week 5 . Rancho Los Amigos Cognitive Scale score great equal 7 6 . Able provide inform consent 1 . Acupuncture treatment reason within past month 2 . Any active unstable psychiatric condition , include active psychosis , suicidal homicidal ideation 3 . Unwillingness part participant complete study visit and/or component intervention 4 . Scheduled surgery treatment phase study 5 . Pregnancy breastfeed time study enrollment study participation 6 . Any medically unstable condition opinion P.I . potential warrant inpatient treatment medical intensive care unit 7 . Inability give inform consent complete study measure
